attributes.action: Stop the extradition of Gary McKinnon
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Home Secretary to reverse his decision not to block the US request for the extradition of Gary McKinnon.

rejection.details: The Home Secretary does not have general discretion in this case. He can only stop extradition if he finds that McKinnon’s human rights would be breached.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
